name: Puzzle Ring
flavorText: Clearly the product of an ingenious and befuddling mind, this ring has interlocking pieces that rotate and shift to reveal strange glowing patterns. Every configuration reveals a different magical property.

secondary.textHtml: +[32 - 35]% Extra Gold from Monsters
Summon a treasure goblin who picks up normal-quality items for you. After picking up 16 items, he drops a rare item with a chance for a legendary. [12 - 16]
